DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy Entecavir maleate tablet Chinese patient hepatitis B
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Entecavir Maleate Tablets Chinese Patients With Hepatitis B
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects diagnose HBeAg positive negative chronic hepatitis B 2 . Aged 18 70 year old，male female 3 . Patients previously HBsAgpositive , HBeAgpositive 24 week , HBVDNA > 105copies/ml . HBeAgnegative 24 week , HBVDNA > 105 copies/ml . 4 . 1.3 time upper normal limit ( 1.3 × ULN ) ≤ alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) ≤ 10 × ULN . 5 . Total serum bilirubin ( TBIL ) ≤ 2.5 × ULN . 6 . Prothrombin activity ( PTA ) ≥ 60 % prothrombin time prolong normal ≤ 3 second ) . 7 . WBC ≥ 3.5 × 109 / L , PLT ≥ 70 × 109 / L , serum albumin ( ALB ) ≥ 35 g / L. 8 . Creatinine ( Cr ) ≤ 1.5 × ULN . 9 . If patient take intermittently interferon , nucleoside ( acid ) analogue , α1 thymosin enrollment 24 week , time 12 week . 10 . Patients sign informed consent form compliance good . 1 . Patients infected virus HAV , HCV , HDV , HEV , CMV , EBV , HIV etc . 2 . Patients cirrhosis liver cancer . 3 . Patients participate another therapeutic clinical trial 3 month . 4 . Granulocyte count < 1.5 × 109 / L , hemoglobin ( HB ) < 100g / L , serum alphafetoprotein ( AFP ) > 100μg / L , patient ' B ultrasonography point spaceoccupying lesion . 5 . Patients severe heart , kidney , endocrine hematopoietic system neuropsychiatric disease . 6 . Patients metabolic autoimmune disease systemic lupus erythematosus . 7 . Pregnant woman , lactate woman wre allergic study drug .
